text: JUST IN: Bitcoin SV, the network that split off from the Bitcoin Cash blockchain in late 2018, has cut its miners’ block reward in half for the first time. @WolfieZhao reports.https://www.coindesk.com/bitcoin-svs-first-halving-crimps-profits-for-bsv-miners …

BCH has surged almost 4% since Tuesday. Bitcoin SV, another bitcoin fork expecting its own halving Friday, rose almost 14% over the last two days. Bitcoin gold was even more remarkable, up 17%. But bitcoin prices were relatively unchanged. Image: @coindeskdatapic.twitter.com/J54LQSRNB6
Bitcoin SV has hard forked with apparently a minor "inadvertent" split, taking its blockchain back to the first iteration of the bitcoin protocol. Via @paddybaker_http://ow.ly/kJPZ50yd1v3
Volatility in bitcoin SV (BSV) is raising concerns about the resilience and stability of the world’s fifth-largest cryptocurrency. Report by @Sebsinclair1989:http://ow.ly/ab4850y7jpd
A coming code update for the cryptocurrency bitcoin SV will render some features of @BitGo's wallets useless, the crypto custodian says.http://ow.ly/qICO50xDZqd

After a recent network upgrade, some nodes separated from the bitcoin SV blockchain, highlighting why hard forks prompt much infighting among blockchain devs. Report by @AlyssaHertig http://ow.ly/f8ls50vtsmJ $BSV

Before his love of #bitcoinSV and potentially becoming a troll himself (have you seen that Craig Wright as Jesus Christ video?!), @ryanxcharles was #reddit's short-lived #cryptocurrency engineer. WATCH HERE!https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2paI-VD5xq8 …
Scammers boosted the price of bitcoin SV with a fake news alert purporting to show $BSV's creator is also bitcoin's http://ow.ly/mcCZ50usg7u via @johnbiggs

The price of Bitcoin SV $BSV jumped over 200% on some exchanges today after its main proponent Craig Wright registered copyright claims on the Bitcoin Whitepaper and original code. http://ow.ly/hBKj50ulgKO via @samadamsSAO
OPINION: Is cryptocurrency exchange Binance’s delisting of bitcoin SV a form of censorship? http://ow.ly/H73b30oyjq4
The controversy over delisting the bitcoin SV cryptocurrency shows why exchanges need more consistent standards and rules, argues @mikejcasey. http://ow.ly/7nj950r98Eb
BREAKING from @baidakova: @krakenfx is the latest crypto exchange to delist bitcoin SV $BSVhttp://ow.ly/6uDP50qvP6A
LIVE on #CryptoController: Crypto exchanges are delisting bitcoin SV https://clips.twitch.tv/FaintShinySalamanderBrokeBack?tt_medium=twtr …

JUST IN: @krakenfx is the latest crypto exchange to delist bitcoin SV $BSV amid an ongoing feud between coin creator Craig Wright and members of the bitcoin community. http://ow.ly/mFvw50qvvil @baidakova writes
JUST IN: @binance is delisting bitcoin SV $BSV days after CEO @cz_binance called Craig Wright, the fork's creator, a "fraud." http://ow.ly/ZlM550qjK52 @nikhileshde writes
As of 19:30 UTC, http://bitcoin.com and http://btc.com have mined 12 blocks on Bitcoin ABC, while Mempool, SVPool and CoinGeek have mined 6 blocks on Bitcoin SV. #BitcoinCash #hashwar
SVPool has now also mined blocks 4 and 5 on the Bitcoin SV chain #BitcoinCash #hashwar
Bitmain's http://BTC.com has mined the 8th block on Bitcoin ABC, while SVPool has mined the 3rd overall Bitcoin SV block. #BitcoinCash #hashwar
http://Bitcoin.com has now mined 7 total blocks on Bitcoin ABC since hard fork activation while Bitcoin SV has mined two. #BitcoinCash #hashwar
SVPool has mined a second Bitcoin SV block while Bitcoin ABC has now mined four total blocks #BitcoinCash #hashwar
Coin Dance is showing that a block has been mined on Bitcoin SV by Mempool #BitcoinCash #hashwar
Bitcoin ABC has now mined two blocks, with the latest containing 18,626 transactions. Bitcoin SV appears to be pending. #BitcoinCash #hashwar
Bitcoin ABC's price has fallen to $255 while Bitcoin SV's price has jumped up to $100 on Poloniex #BitcoinCash
Pre-fork trading data from Poloniex indicates that Bitcoin SV's price continues to drop slowly, now trading at $85, while Bitcoin ABC's price is about $292 #BitcoinCash #hashwar
Bitcoin cash's ongoing hash war remains lopsided, with mining pools supporting Bitcoin SV controlling nearly 75 percent of the current network http://ow.ly/o07d30mD8Vm
Over the past day, bitcoin cash mining pools supporting Craig Wright's Bitcoin SV have consolidated even more of the relative amount of hash power http://ow.ly/9yv330mBuBm
Early data suggests that the Bitcoin SV implementation of the bitcoin cash fork may enjoy more hash power than Bitcoin ABC. http://ow.ly/hQ0u30mAB1L
